alternative_parents.description: Organosulfur compounds containing a tosyl group, with the general formula CH3C6H4S(O2)R (R =  any atom).
alternative_parents.name: Tosyl compounds

alternative_parents.description: Compounds containing the sulfonyl group, with the general structure RS(=O)2R' ( R,R' must not be H).
alternative_parents.name: Sulfonyls

alternative_parents.description: Compounds containing a sulfonyl (R-S(=O)2-R') functional group singly bonded to a chlorine atom.
alternative_parents.name: Sulfonyl chlorides

alternative_parents.description: Compounds containing a sulfonic acid or derivative, with the general structure RS(=O)2X (R=alkyl, aryl; X=any heteroatom).
alternative_parents.name: Organosulfonic acids and derivatives

alternative_parents.description: Organic compounds containing an oxide group.
alternative_parents.name: Organic oxides

alternative_parents.description: Derivatives of hydrocarbons obtained by substituting one or more carbon atoms by an heteroatom. They contain at least one carbon atom and heteroatom.
alternative_parents.name: Hydrocarbon derivatives

class.description: Aromatic compounds containing one monocyclic ring system consisting of benzene.
class.name: Benzene and substituted derivatives

description: This compound belongs to the class of organic compounds known as benzenesulfonyl chlorides. These are aromatic compounds containing a benzenesulfonyl group, where the sulfonyl moiety is singly boned to a chloride atom.

direct_parent.description: Aromatic compounds containing a benzenesulfonyl group, where the sulfonyl moiety is singly boned to a chloride atom.
direct_parent.name: Benzenesulfonyl chlorides

intermediate_nodes.description: Aromatic compounds containing a benzenesulfonyl group, where the sulfonyl moiety is singly boned to an halogen atom.
intermediate_nodes.name: Benzenesulfonyl halides

kingdom.description: Compounds that contain at least one carbon atom, excluding isocyanide/cyanide and their non-hydrocarbyl derivatives, thiophosgene, carbon diselenide, carbon monosulfide, carbon disulfide, carbon subsulfide, carbon monoxide, carbon dioxide, Carbon suboxide, and dicarbon monoxide.
kingdom.name: Organic compounds

subclass.description: Aromatic compounds containing a benzenesulfonyl group, which consists of a monocyclic benzene moiety that carries a sulfonyl group.
subclass.name: Benzenesulfonyl compounds

superclass.description: Aromatic compounds containing one or more benzene rings.
superclass.name: Benzenoids
